Cooking For Dummies.

#675

Kale.

The best way to cook Kale is with a dash of olive oil and lightly salt in a frying pan.

Once the Kale begins to crisp , turn off the stove top.

Let cool to room temperature.

Then take the frypan and scrape contents into the nearest bin.
